summary: THE FALSE ONE RISES, begins with an invitation to accompany a famous traveller on a grand adventure... Before long you are slumming it with the scum of Skyrim. Squeezing out information by whatever means necessary as the body count rises. You\'ll be facing other adventurers and you may want to take a friend or two with you.
descriptionHtml:
THE FALSE ONE RISES, begins with an invitation to accompany a famous traveller on a grand adventure... Before long you are slumming it with the scum of Skyrim. Squeezing out information by whatever means necessary as the body count rises. You\'ll be facing other adventurers and you may want to take a friend or two with you.

This quest doesn\'t hold your hand. It requires just a little bit of reading clues. You will be making conversation choices that reflect your style of character. You will be travelling to different locations.  It is fully voiced.

There is an interesting story, some nice loot, a new follower (optional), some marriageable characters, violent enemies and an exciting final battle.

[IMG]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v212/ElectraNemora/akan.jpg[/IMG]

This mod requires no other mods to play. It is unlikely to cause conflicts. It adds new characters and situations, not locations. 

To install simply unzip the file and drop the Data file into your Skyrim directory.  Say yes to merging files.  Uninstallation instructions in the Readme.

It starts as soon as you log in. Let me know if you beat it.

Many thanks,

Erebus

VERSION 3: Improved speed and volume of voice acting and added some scripts to kick-off fights.
author: Erebus Red

files.name: The False One Rises  version three
